de.dfki.dmas.owls2wsdl.utils
Class HandbookEnvBuilder

java.lang.Object
  de.dfki.dmas.owls2wsdl.utils.HandbookEnvBuilder

public class HandbookEnvBuilder
extends java.lang.Object

Helper class that synchronizes web pages SVN to local application directory. Used as long there is no regular webpage with OWLS2WSDL handbook.
